channel.title: Compiling error while making double exp weekend
channel.description: [code]src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:343: error: cannot find symbol Calendar calendar = new GregorianCalendar(); ^ symbol: class Calendar location: class PlayerHandler src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:343: error: cannot find symbol Calendar calendar = new GregorianCalendar(); ^ symbol: class GregorianCalendar location: class PlayerHandler src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:344: error: cannot find symbol int day = calendar.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK); ^ symbol: variable Calendar location: class PlayerHandler src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:348: error: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:352: error: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:355: error: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.[/code]

item.title: Compiling error while making double exp weekend
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

I changed import server.config*; to import server.config; and now there’s only 5 errors src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:347: error: cannot find symbol if(day = saturday){ ^ symbol: variable saturday location: class PlayerHandler src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:347: error: incompatible types if(day = saturday){ ^ required: boolean found: int src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:353: error: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:357: error: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:360: error: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

at the top of the file you should add:

item.title: Compiling error while making double exp weekend
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Calendar calendar = new GregorianCalendar();
needs to be
Calendar cal = new GregorianCalendar();

Missing import for what looks like config. Try import server.Config.*; instead of import server.Config;

Also, I’m not sure that Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK is defined. Maybe try something such as

int day = cal.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH); if(day = saturday){ ... }

Try that stuff and tell me what you get.

Read full topic
item.source: Compiling error while making double exp weekend

item.title: Compiling error while making double exp weekend
item.dc:creator: @john1716 john1716
item.description:
@john1716 wrote:

I did that but I still got this error src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:4: error: cannot find symbol import java.util.Calander; ^ symbol: class Calander location: package java.util src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:345: error: cannot find symbol Calendar calendar = new GregorianCalendar(); ^ symbol: class Calendar location: class PlayerHandler src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:346: error: cannot find symbol int day = calendar.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK); ^ symbol: variable Calendar location: class PlayerHandler src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:350: error: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:354: error: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; ^ src\server\model\players\PlayerHandler.java:357: error: cannot assign a value to final variable SERVER_EXP_BONUS Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1; ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.

This is what’s in my playerhandler.java

[code]package server.model.players;

import java.net.InetSocketAddress;
import java.util.Calander;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;

import server.Config;
import server.Server;
import server.model.npcs.NPCHandler;
import server.util.Misc;
import server.util.Stream;
[/code]
and at the bottom of it is

} public final void getDoubleEXPWeekend() { Calendar calendar = new GregorianCalendar(); int day = calendar.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK); Config.doubleEXPWeekend = false; if (day > 6) { Config.doubleEXPWeekend = true; Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; return; } else if (day < 2) { Config.doubleEXPWeekend = true; Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 2; return; } Config.SERVER_EXP_BONUS = 1; } }

Read full topic
item.source: Compiling error while making double exp weekend

item.title: Compiling error while making double exp weekend
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:5, topic:450430”]You need to import the java class at the top

import java.util.Calander;

(Add that at the top of the class, underneath the package, above the class name).[/quote]

I was trying to let him figure it out. But since you’ve already told him half of it, you’ll also need

import java.util.GregorianCalendar;

Read full topic
